items.text: good length, angling into the left-hander, who punches it to a widish mid-on
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, he stays in his crease and punches it past cover
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: fuller ball that time, and it's played back to the bowler
items.shortText: Paul to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: chipped over the in-field and down to long-off. Not exactly where he wanted to send it, but controlled well in the end
items.shortText: Powell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, he takes a half step forward to drive, but straight to cover
items.shortText: Powell to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: he's varying his length, went very full that time. Mahmuddullah was late in bringing bat down, and just manages to hit it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Powell to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: back of a length now outside off, steered to point
items.shortText: Powell to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: gets one away the dot balls were building for Mahmudullah, but this was nicely dealt with. Back of a length outside off, he transferred weight back and cut it past gully for a well-timed four
items.shortText: Powell to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

items.text: fuller ball, he picks it up from outside off and wrists it to long-on
items.shortText: Powell to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.preText: Amzad : "After 20 overs scoring rate is going down. Guess pitch becoming slow with the time. 270 could be a good total. But WI team is the most unpredictable team now a days. Most of their players have power hiting capacity. "
items.text: full ball on middle, picked off his toes to deep square leg
items.shortText: Paul to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: length ball angling into him, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: good length angling into him again, he punches it to long-on
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: goes for it and connects very full and in the slot to drive, he went at it powerfully and sent it over extra cover and into the fence
items.shortText: Paul to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball outside off, steered to short third man
items.shortText: Paul to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: driven nicely but straight to cover. Full ball, in the slot to drive, and Mahmudullah's finding his timing now, but this was straight to the fielder
items.shortText: Paul to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: fuller ball, driven to mid-on
items.shortText: Powell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length, angling across him, pushed to mid-off
items.shortText: Powell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length ball on leg stump, he comes forward to flick it to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Powell to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: goes fuller then, and Shakib is expecting that perhaps, goes down to sweep and sends it to square leg
items.shortText: Powell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: fuller ball outside off, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Powell to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: back of a length, he comes forward to work it to deep square leg for a couple
items.shortText: Powell to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

items.preText: Rony: "As Bishoo managed to give only 27 runs in 10 overs with 36 dot ball and picked up 2 wickets as well. It indicates Bangladeshi spinners will get the same opportunity also along with dew on the field. Considering this 270 is a good score hopefully."
items.text: back of a length outside off, cut to point
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, goes for the drive but it only goes to cover off the inside half of the bat
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: leading edge travels high to fine leg Darren Bravo perhaps was too slow to react, or lost the ball. It ends up dropping just in front of him, running sideways from fine leg along the rope.
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball, flicked to mid-on
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
